input_str:
Guest columnist Meaghan Earley is an associate at Euphoria Vapor, located in Middleburg Heights. She supports the use of e-cigarettes in public places and their use in helping smokers quit.

There is a constant debate regarding whether or not electronic cigarettes should be banned in public places. Working at Euphoria Vapor, a Cleveland vapor lounge, obviously means that I disagree with this statement, however it goes a little deeper than my
